testcase.name: Entering destination
testcase.system-out: Given I am in hotel page....................................................passed When I click on destination and it should clear the existing destination....passed Then I enter the required destination "Hyderabad"...........................passed Then I should click on search...............................................passed

testcase.name: Invalid Destination
testcase.system-out: Given I am in hotel page....................................................passed When I enter the "#@Ey".....................................................passed Then I should see Oops! No results were found for this keyword. Please modify your search and try again..passed
